statements: DELETE FROM WasteComposition WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND landfill_capacity > 10000
DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE landfill_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM waste_composition WHERE waste_type='Plastic' AND research_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE current_capacity < 10000 AND expansion_plans = TRUE;
DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE landfill_area < 100 AND current_fill_level > 50
DELETE FROM LandfillCapacity WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM forecasting_data WHERE landfill_id = 3 AND prediction_date = '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM forecasting_data WHERE landfill_id = 5 AND prediction_date < '2022-01-01';
